definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: He invited me to play it with the band.
sentences.chinese: 他邀请我吹奏萨克斯管，和乐队合作。

sentences.english: Jeff's hardheaded analysis does not stop at why and how to do all this.
sentences.chinese: 萨克斯无懈可击的分析，并不止步于推导和建议。

sentences.english: Last year he went to Kazakstan.
sentences.chinese: 去年，他去了哈萨克斯坦。
那钢琴演奏者兼作萨克斯管吹奏员。

sentences.english: Referring to the Sachs VT5000 brake backplate.
Rustam Yargaliyev was Kazakhstan's top scorer with 26 points.
sentences.chinese: 哈萨克斯坦的某某得了比赛的最高的26分。

sentences.english: Increasingly, Kazakhstan is becoming an important bridge between East and West.
sentences.chinese: 哈萨克斯坦渐渐发展为连接中西方的桥梁。

sentences.english: SCO anti-terror drill kicks off in Kazakhstan .
sentences.chinese: 上海合作组织反恐演习在哈萨克斯坦揭幕。

sentences.english: She will carry her dress shoes in a plastic bag from Saks.
sentences.chinese: 她会把高跟鞋放在一个萨克斯的塑料袋子里。

sentences.english: I mainly blowing saxophones and musical instruments, such as the flute.
sentences.chinese: 我主要是吹萨克斯风和民族乐器，例如笛子。

sentences.english: The saxophonist doubled the drum in the band.
sentences.chinese: 那位萨克斯管吹奏员在乐队中兼作鼓手。

sentences.english: Brass baritone by Adolphe Sax, Paris ca.
sentences.chinese: 黄铜由萨克斯男中音，巴黎的CA。

sentences.english: Could you introduce briefly the sports exchange of Kazakstan with other countries?
sentences.chinese: 您能谈谈哈萨克斯坦与世界各国的体育交流情况吗？

sentences.english: Well, admitted Saxe, the Pentagon is already trying to recruit her.
sentences.chinese: 哦，萨克斯承认，五角大楼已经在试图招募她。

sentences.english: At the police academy, Fedorova played the saxophone as a member of the brass band.
sentences.chinese: 进入警察学院后费德洛娃吹萨克斯，是军乐队的成员。

sentences.english: George is mad about his new saxophone.
sentences.chinese: 乔治对他的新萨克斯风爱不释手。

definition: double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
